programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: Slade takes us around the hometown hunting grounds and shows us some of the last bits of preparation for the season. An old buck thats been showing up on camera at night decides to daylight and pays the price.

programme.title: AFTCO Original Film
programme.desc: Few freshwater species are more steeped in lore than North America's native muskellunge. Sporting the nickname "The fish of ten thousand casts," musky remains unchecked on the bucket list of many casual and committed anglers. Spencer Berman caught and landed his first "by accident," a fortuitous but ultimately fateful encounter. "I got bit by the musky bug at a young age," he says, and it appears the bug is alive and well. It drives me to be better, do better, fish longer, work harder, put more into it, do more prep work, to check each and every component. Im forever and always willing to make one more cast.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through the mountains of western North Carolina, where we stop in Asheville and Cashiers!!

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through South Carolina, where we stop in Clemson, Travelers Rest and Charleston!!

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through Georgia, where we stop in Helen, Alpharetta and Atlanta!!

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Denise Sanchez was awarded a hunt at G2 following our Hunters Extravaganza drawings. Its great to get to spend time on the ranch with new members of TTHA. Denise gets familiar with a giant and learns about new technology while on this hunt.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Every year, hunters from across the country flock to various parts of Texas to extend their hunting season. This year, our friends from Struttinbuck did just the same. Matt and Clede make the long drive to Del Rio to hunt South Texas bucks right on the Mexico border.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We find ourselves fishing with Troy from Lonestar Beer. Not only is Troy a great friend he is also a big supporter of Hunters Extravaganza. We get to catch up in the offseason and spend a day on the water discussing future events and reflect on what all Texas has to offer.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: In 2010, Amberly Snyders life changed forever when an accident left her paralyzed from the waist-down. Her comeback story not unlike something youd see in a moviein fact it inspired one. Disabled Outdoorsmen USA contacted TTHA and set up this hunt and we were fortunate enough to be able to capture just some of Amberlys story and her harvest of a beautiful Axis buck at the G2 Ranch in the spring of 2022.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Cable is a huge supporter of Texas Hunting and everything Teas Trophy Hunters. We are blessed to spend a few days with hum at the beautiful Saddle Creek Ranch in Brady Texas. Greg has a tight management plan and we are glad we got to enjoy his ranch with him and his team.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Josh Kinser from Big and J introduced his daughters to hunting throughout South TX. With trips earlier in the year cancelled, Josh and Hattie were invited to join the TTHA crew at G2 ranch. The first night of the hunt proved to be a success for Hattie, wrapping a TX tag around her biggest buck. Josh and Hattie will have memories to last a lifetime after this hunt!

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: WE join Bobby Falkenberg as he joins Bret Ferguson from Double T Outfitters. Bobby is an avid outdoorsman, judge, and father of 5. Bret manages 30,000 acres in Ozona TX, the knowledge he has of every inch of this amazing low fence ranch is remarkable. Bobby has an action packed 2 day hunt.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: The bond between and parent and child can grow in many ways, but nothing compares to the bond shared when hunting. The annual Father-Son hunt at FE Hill Outfitters has becoming a tradition for Heath and his son Gavin and in 2021, Gavin was able to take his largest buck to date, with his dad Heath behind the camera.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Mike Frenette takes Blair off the coast of Louisiana to catch their limit of red snapper.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: After booking a trip at the last Indian River Clam Restoration banquete, the guys at Gold Key Roofing got a chance to fish with Capt. Blair and Capt. Mike Frenette.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Chris Broome takes Capt. Blair to catch snook at Marco Island.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Mike Avinon takes Blair off Naples for a variety of fish.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff dive into the wild waters off Hawaiis coast, coming face-to-face with sharks and graceful manta rays. The adrenaline peaks when Kyle takes a heart-pounding leap off a towering 40-foot cliff, making this adventure as daring as it is unforgettable.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff explore the breathtaking Waipio Valley, the Hawaiian "Valley of the Kings," in search of prawns and bullfrogs. Their adventure continues up a massive volcano, hunting invasive rams, before ending with a feast of native fish paired with island fruits and spices.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff hear about the dangers of fishing for Bluefin Tuna in the Atlantic Ocean from locals in Gloucester, Massachusetts. Then they head 30 miles out onto the open ocean with Darrin of Reel Respect Charters in the hopes of landing their own giant.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff team up with their friends from Boss Shotshells in South Dakota for a high-energy upland hunt, pursuing wild pheasants with the help of skilled hunting dogs. The adventure takes a quirky turn with a visit to the iconic Corn Palace.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Black Cloud joins The Fowl Life TV at WyoBraska Outfitters. Chad Belding and his team take us along as they hunt Canadian Geese in the Great Plains.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Timber duck hunts may be the most exciting way to hunt ducks! With strange conditions following the opening of the second split, Cole and the Black Cloud crew struggle to find ducks. Luckily a good friend has a pocket of Timber that is holding birds and invites the guys along for a shoot.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Friends from DSG Outerwear, Wendy Gavinski, Rachelle Hedrick, Kaitlin Bowen and Jennifer Homa meet up with the Black Cloud crew to duck hunt opening day in Louisiana.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck checks one off the bucket list. He's hunting gators for the first time.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: The Black Cloud crew heads to the timber of Arkansas to hunt with good friends in an old blind thats seen many unbelievable hunts throughout the years.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and his son Dalton along with Billy and the gang hit the timber of Arkansas for another epic hunt.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: The Black Cloud crew takes you to Alberta for an epic Canada Duck Hunt. Watch as Chad Belding and his crew scout and hunt dry field mallards.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: The Black Cloud crew travels to Louisiana to hunt with the Realtree waterfowl pro staff. This episode features Rusty Creasey, manager of the famed Coco Cola woods in Arkansas. Rusty takes a day off during the split to hunt with Realtrees Stephen McNelly and Cole Barthel. Be sure to subscribe and follow along as we feature duck hunting Legends like Jim Ronquest, Si Roberston, Dr. Duck, Justin Martin, and more.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt Justin & Merediths beautiful Panama City Beach morning is met with a slack tide so a new path to redfish success is found under a popular bridge.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: If you had a blank check to build the best fishing boat possible, what would you create? Capt. Justin gets his wish, but it doesnt come quickly or easily.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin takes a fellow guide on his new boat to see how it measures up. Using only public waypoints on his Humminbird unit, they find exploring to be as much fun as it is fruitful.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin heads offshore, dodges storms and shows how the "Return 'Em Right" program is saving fish that experience barotrauma.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Embark on a journey through Scotland's hunting traditions, exploring bird shoots, grouse moors, and red stag hunts while discovering the evolving role of hunting in conservation.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Navigating the complex issues of deer management, Dan Cabela travels between Scotland and England to learn how land managers balance conservation with wild food harvesting.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Heading to one of the great wilderness areas of North America, Dan Cabela is in search of Stone Sheep in British Columbia. Joining scientists, they embark on an ambitious conservation project to help conserve this incredible species.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Join Dan Cabela as he travels across Argentina to see how scientists and hunters are working together. From region-wide bird surveys to the incredible conservation work being done on the critically endangered huemul deer, this beautiful country has no shortage of fascinating stories.

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Richard Black & Capt. Randy fish Biscayne Bay.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin takes a fellow guide on his new boat to see how it measures up. Using only public waypoints on his Humminbird unit, they find exploring to be as much fun as it is fruitful.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Saltwater Experience Charters Captain Garrett Stephens for a trip into the Gulf. When their catches get repeatedly cut off, they decide to bring the massive bull sharks up to the surface for a closer look.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: After wrestling with some massive bull sharks, Captains Tom Rowland, Rich Tudor and guest Captain Garrett Stephens encounter some crazy cobia action and it takes all their strength and skill to keep them away from the sharks.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor utilize the Yellowfin Hybrid 26 to bring the Live Paddle Boards out to an Islamorada flat for a fun day of fishing for bonefish and some toothy critters.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor run west from Hawks Cay to fish the spring tarpon migration at the legendary Bahia Honda bridge.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor head down to Key West to join Captain Brandon Cyr for some skinny water bonefishing.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor fish the Lower Keys with Captain Brandon Cyr for baby tarpon in the mangroves.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: While releasing a defeated tarpon healthy after an epic battle is the ultimate victory, everything else is measured in heartbreak and degrees of failure. For Justin, putting Ethan on his first silver king requires patience and a tasty diversion by a local chef.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Meredith learns the value of the Trash Can Slam on a flounder trip withCapt. Justin that turns into a multi-species challenge.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: World record fly fisherman Nathaniel Linville shares his journey from troubled youth and addiction to redemption through fly fishing. After hitting rock bottom, he finds purpose in sobriety and relentless dedication, ultimately rising to the top as a world-record permit angler in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Jack Given & The Fish For Holly Crew Championship Style!

programme.title: LBP Spotlight
programme.desc: Hes the original fishing coach. From the helm of one of the most iconic inshore shows ever made, Captain C.A. Richardson has taught a generation how to fish. This documentary dives into his story. The man, the mission, and the waters that made him who he is.

programme.title: LBP Spotlight
programme.desc: Meet just a few of the amazing crew members of the Old Salt Board of Directors. This nonprofit is more than just a fishing group. They make a difference in their community.

programme.title: LBP Spotlight
programme.desc: Kylee Short, an Orlando based bass angler, shares how she discovered fishing later in life. This LBP Spotlight highlights her journey on the water and strong family support.

programme.title: LBP Spotlight
programme.desc: Meet Captain Lionel James a respected Destin, Florida guide known for his upbeat personality, strong community ties, and love for fitness when hes not on the water.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: CA revisits some of the best moments of the year and some never before seen footage!

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Ca heads to Murrells Inlet, SC for some low country lure slingin'. What's on your menu? Shrimp and grits or Flounder?

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Ca Fishes in his home waters for probably the most powerful inshore fish, the gag grouper.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Road trip time! Embrace the frigid temps with CA on this special episode, fishing for the cape Fear Slam.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Chef Jean-Paul Bourgeois and the crew are back at it for season 3 of duck camp dinners. With a historically dry year in Louisiana, the team dodges marsh fires, hunts alligators, and prepares for the opening day of teal season.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Follow the DCD crew as they head North to hunt with duck call maker Brad Eldrige. Despite tough hunting conditions brought on by a historic drought in Louisiana, the crew is able to knock down a Tensas Limit of wood ducks, mallards, honkers, and squirrels.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: Yellowfin tuna are firing offshore New Jersey. Nick puts together a brand new tuna crew with NYPD cop bodybuilder influencer Mike Counihan to join Capt. JR Licato on the Hookin Up Sportfishing for gut-wrenching battles with yellowfin pushing the 80-pound mark.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: Summer fluke fishing is firing during the Jersey summer. Nick sets out with flounder pro Capt. Lou Grazioso to dial the fluke in, then gathers an old school crew of friends and their kids to try their luck on the party boat Gambler, competing to see who can win the battle of the pros vs. the newbies.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: WWE pro wrestling hall of fame legend Jake the Snake Roberts joins Nick in a no holds barred main event match against Jersey stripers during an incredible Raritan Bay run. Nick and Jake put the finishing moves down on bass, then Nick finds a monster bass bite on topwater poppers later in the day with good friends Bender and Drew Dog.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: Surf Fishing for Stripers is at full on Fall Run intensity in New Jersey. Nick assembles a hardcore local crew of surfcasters including rock star Dean Ween and Man vs Food host Casey Webb to for mindblowing surf action from the sands as they come tight with hundreds of stripers in an all out blitz.

programme.title: Local Lines
programme.desc: Check out this episode of Local Lines where Brandon Branch Chases Bluefin Tuna out of San Diago.

programme.title: Local Lines
programme.desc: In this episode of Local Lines Television, Brandon is fishing with Steve Grant of Diamond Fishing Products.

programme.title: Local Lines
programme.desc: Today Capt. Brandon is fishing the big bend with Capt. Matt.

programme.title: Local Lines
programme.desc: Brandon fishes Lake Henderson with his long-time fishing buddy Hunter Bozeman.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is in Ethiopia hunting Mountain Nyala. After the first two days, Mark has taken a Meneliks Bushbuck and a Colobus Monkey but no Mountain Nyala. Finally, on Day 3 the hunting party receives the green light from the military to hunt in the area they wanted. It's time to put the Gunwerks rifle to the test.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is in the final stretch of completing the South America Upland Slam. Having already checked off nine species in Argentina, he now finds himself in Peru, where he faces the challenge of tracking down two elusive species to complete his list: the Andean Tinamou and the Western Peruvian Dove.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Join Mark Peterson as he embarks on a thrilling hunt in Croatia for the Eurasian Brown Bear. Experience the beauty of the Croatian wilderness and witness the skill and precision required for a successful hunt. Follow along as Mark faces all the challenges dealing with wind and a big bear that is extremely smart, making it very difficult to harvest this amazing animal. Dont miss this exciting hunting adventure with Mark Peterson in Croatia!

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson continues his quest on the Hearst Ranch in California. Next up on the list, California Aoudad. These Aoudad were introduced to the ranch in the early 1920s and have thrived ever since.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson closes out the half way point on the South America Waterfowl Slam. On just the third day of the hunt, he is able to take a Chilean Wigeon and a Rosy Billed Pochard which make species number 9 and 10 of the 20 on his list. Mark is still sharing the blind with Matt Gindorff, a WTA consultant, and they discuss waterfowl hunting in Argentina and how it compares to that of the U.S.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson finishes the South America Waterfowl Slam in the Andes at 15,000 feet elevation. With only 2 days left, he is able to capitalize on every opportunity and take the remaining 6 species needed on the list of 20. It's been an incredible journey, and it all comes down to this!

programme.title: Huntstand Presents
programme.desc: Massive wildfires had consumed thousands of acres across the Bighorn Mountains and the neighboring foothills. Would the annual HuntStand pronghorn camp be a total bust, or would the crew be able to find a few animals beyond the smoke?

programme.title: Huntstand Presents
programme.desc: The West Texas desert has a way of pulling you in. In Desert Ghost, Will Cooper heads west to Marathon, Texas, with longtime friend and mentor Cody Roberts to hunt aoudad in one of the most remote landscapes in the state. Rooted in family legacy, this film explores Codys deep ties to the desert, the story behind Desert Ghost Distillery, and the mystique of a western oasis near Big Bend National Park. More than a hunt, Desert Ghost dives into the role of aoudad management and its importance to desert bighorn sheep conservation efforts led by Texas Parks and Wildlife and the Wild Sheep Foundation. Sometimes, to protect what belongs here you have to chase the ghosts. You really do have to be tough, determined, or one lucky bastard to make it out in West Texas.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: For decades, Paul Butski has set the standard in turkey calling. His name is etched into the NWTF Grand National Calling Championships Hall of Fame, and his influence stretches far beyond the stage. He didnt just win competitions, he shaped the way we talk to turkeys and more importantly, the way we hunt them.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Todd Rogers embraces the business of being a hunting outfitter as a labor of love. And while so many family-run operations are dwindling in rural America, the Rogers legacy is here to stay. Will Cooper and Josh Dahlke return to western Oklahoma to share this story while pursuing brush-country whitetails in the red dirt.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: They say you come to New Zealand as a stranger, but leave as family. In this episode of DIRT, the crew goes full circlemeeting Muttonbird chefs Emma and George on the South Island before hopping up to Raglan and working their way back down. Water skiing next to snow-capped mountains, cooking in hot springs the Mori way, and stargazing at Wairarapa Dark Sky Reserve are all on the itinerary. But its the final Feed done Kiwi-style that makes one thing clearin this unique and stunning land, nobodys a stranger for long.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation
programme.desc: Part of our responsibility as citizens in this country is to make sure we not only take care of these resources but we hand it off to the next generation in better condition that we found it. -Bob Ziehmer, Senior Director of Conservation for Bass Pro Shops & Cabela's Join Bob in New Mexico as he talks about taking care of our natural resources for future generations. Special thanks to Express UU Bar Ranch

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: A day of reef fishing in Islamorada turns into a Kingfish and Yellowtail frenzy for Captains Scott and Steve.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: It only takes 3 fish to fill the Yeti cooler when Capt Scott fishes the top with kites for Wahoo and Steve pulls a big Mutton Snapper off the bottom.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve take a long run into the Gulf from Stock Island and load thecoolers with Cobia and huge Yellowtail Snapper.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve head west from Key West to battle with big kingfish and end up with plenty of meat for the smoker.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve head out early out of Key West, Scott picks away at theYellowtail Snapper while Steve plays around with Cero Mackerel on fly.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve catch Bonitas for bait and slow troll them around wrecks for Wahoo and Kingfish.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: From battling towering 12-foot waves in the Gulf of Alaska, to reeling in colossal 200 lb. halibut, they discover firsthand the rugged beauty of America's 49th state. This episode highlights Lindell Yachts as a top builder of rugged offshore sportfishing yachts, as well as Radon Boats as great pilothouse fishing and guide boats.

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Richard Black & Capt. Randy fish Biscayne Bay.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: Slade takes us around the hometown hunting grounds and shows us some of the last bits of preparation for the season. An old buck thats been showing up on camera at night decides to daylight and pays the price.

programme.title: AFTCO Original Film
programme.desc: Few freshwater species are more steeped in lore than North America's native muskellunge. Sporting the nickname "The fish of ten thousand casts," musky remains unchecked on the bucket list of many casual and committed anglers. Spencer Berman caught and landed his first "by accident," a fortuitous but ultimately fateful encounter. "I got bit by the musky bug at a young age," he says, and it appears the bug is alive and well. It drives me to be better, do better, fish longer, work harder, put more into it, do more prep work, to check each and every component. Im forever and always willing to make one more cast.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through the mountains of western North Carolina, where we stop in Asheville and Cashiers!!

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through South Carolina, where we stop in Clemson, Travelers Rest and Charleston!!

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through Georgia, where we stop in Helen, Alpharetta and Atlanta!!

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Denise Sanchez was awarded a hunt at G2 following our Hunters Extravaganza drawings. Its great to get to spend time on the ranch with new members of TTHA. Denise gets familiar with a giant and learns about new technology while on this hunt.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Every year, hunters from across the country flock to various parts of Texas to extend their hunting season. This year, our friends from Struttinbuck did just the same. Matt and Clede make the long drive to Del Rio to hunt South Texas bucks right on the Mexico border.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We find ourselves fishing with Troy from Lonestar Beer. Not only is Troy a great friend he is also a big supporter of Hunters Extravaganza. We get to catch up in the offseason and spend a day on the water discussing future events and reflect on what all Texas has to offer.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: In 2010, Amberly Snyders life changed forever when an accident left her paralyzed from the waist-down. Her comeback story not unlike something youd see in a moviein fact it inspired one. Disabled Outdoorsmen USA contacted TTHA and set up this hunt and we were fortunate enough to be able to capture just some of Amberlys story and her harvest of a beautiful Axis buck at the G2 Ranch in the spring of 2022.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Cable is a huge supporter of Texas Hunting and everything Teas Trophy Hunters. We are blessed to spend a few days with hum at the beautiful Saddle Creek Ranch in Brady Texas. Greg has a tight management plan and we are glad we got to enjoy his ranch with him and his team.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Josh Kinser from Big and J introduced his daughters to hunting throughout South TX. With trips earlier in the year cancelled, Josh and Hattie were invited to join the TTHA crew at G2 ranch. The first night of the hunt proved to be a success for Hattie, wrapping a TX tag around her biggest buck. Josh and Hattie will have memories to last a lifetime after this hunt!

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: WE join Bobby Falkenberg as he joins Bret Ferguson from Double T Outfitters. Bobby is an avid outdoorsman, judge, and father of 5. Bret manages 30,000 acres in Ozona TX, the knowledge he has of every inch of this amazing low fence ranch is remarkable. Bobby has an action packed 2 day hunt.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: The bond between and parent and child can grow in many ways, but nothing compares to the bond shared when hunting. The annual Father-Son hunt at FE Hill Outfitters has becoming a tradition for Heath and his son Gavin and in 2021, Gavin was able to take his largest buck to date, with his dad Heath behind the camera.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Mike Frenette takes Blair off the coast of Louisiana to catch their limit of red snapper.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: After booking a trip at the last Indian River Clam Restoration banquete, the guys at Gold Key Roofing got a chance to fish with Capt. Blair and Capt. Mike Frenette.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Chris Broome takes Capt. Blair to catch snook at Marco Island.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Mike Avinon takes Blair off Naples for a variety of fish.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff dive into the wild waters off Hawaiis coast, coming face-to-face with sharks and graceful manta rays. The adrenaline peaks when Kyle takes a heart-pounding leap off a towering 40-foot cliff, making this adventure as daring as it is unforgettable.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff explore the breathtaking Waipio Valley, the Hawaiian "Valley of the Kings," in search of prawns and bullfrogs. Their adventure continues up a massive volcano, hunting invasive rams, before ending with a feast of native fish paired with island fruits and spices.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff hear about the dangers of fishing for Bluefin Tuna in the Atlantic Ocean from locals in Gloucester, Massachusetts. Then they head 30 miles out onto the open ocean with Darrin of Reel Respect Charters in the hopes of landing their own giant.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff team up with their friends from Boss Shotshells in South Dakota for a high-energy upland hunt, pursuing wild pheasants with the help of skilled hunting dogs. The adventure takes a quirky turn with a visit to the iconic Corn Palace.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Black Cloud joins The Fowl Life TV at WyoBraska Outfitters. Chad Belding and his team take us along as they hunt Canadian Geese in the Great Plains.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Timber duck hunts may be the most exciting way to hunt ducks! With strange conditions following the opening of the second split, Cole and the Black Cloud crew struggle to find ducks. Luckily a good friend has a pocket of Timber that is holding birds and invites the guys along for a shoot.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Friends from DSG Outerwear, Wendy Gavinski, Rachelle Hedrick, Kaitlin Bowen and Jennifer Homa meet up with the Black Cloud crew to duck hunt opening day in Louisiana.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck checks one off the bucket list. He's hunting gators for the first time.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: The Black Cloud crew heads to the timber of Arkansas to hunt with good friends in an old blind thats seen many unbelievable hunts throughout the years.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and his son Dalton along with Billy and the gang hit the timber of Arkansas for another epic hunt.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: The Black Cloud crew takes you to Alberta for an epic Canada Duck Hunt. Watch as Chad Belding and his crew scout and hunt dry field mallards.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: The Black Cloud crew travels to Louisiana to hunt with the Realtree waterfowl pro staff. This episode features Rusty Creasey, manager of the famed Coco Cola woods in Arkansas. Rusty takes a day off during the split to hunt with Realtrees Stephen McNelly and Cole Barthel. Be sure to subscribe and follow along as we feature duck hunting Legends like Jim Ronquest, Si Roberston, Dr. Duck, Justin Martin, and more.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt Justin & Merediths beautiful Panama City Beach morning is met with a slack tide so a new path to redfish success is found under a popular bridge.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: If you had a blank check to build the best fishing boat possible, what would you create? Capt. Justin gets his wish, but it doesnt come quickly or easily.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin takes a fellow guide on his new boat to see how it measures up. Using only public waypoints on his Humminbird unit, they find exploring to be as much fun as it is fruitful.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin heads offshore, dodges storms and shows how the "Return 'Em Right" program is saving fish that experience barotrauma.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Embark on a journey through Scotland's hunting traditions, exploring bird shoots, grouse moors, and red stag hunts while discovering the evolving role of hunting in conservation.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Navigating the complex issues of deer management, Dan Cabela travels between Scotland and England to learn how land managers balance conservation with wild food harvesting.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Heading to one of the great wilderness areas of North America, Dan Cabela is in search of Stone Sheep in British Columbia. Joining scientists, they embark on an ambitious conservation project to help conserve this incredible species.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Join Dan Cabela as he travels across Argentina to see how scientists and hunters are working together. From region-wide bird surveys to the incredible conservation work being done on the critically endangered huemul deer, this beautiful country has no shortage of fascinating stories.

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Richard Black & Capt. Randy fish Biscayne Bay.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin takes a fellow guide on his new boat to see how it measures up. Using only public waypoints on his Humminbird unit, they find exploring to be as much fun as it is fruitful.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Saltwater Experience Charters Captain Garrett Stephens for a trip into the Gulf. When their catches get repeatedly cut off, they decide to bring the massive bull sharks up to the surface for a closer look.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: After wrestling with some massive bull sharks, Captains Tom Rowland, Rich Tudor and guest Captain Garrett Stephens encounter some crazy cobia action and it takes all their strength and skill to keep them away from the sharks.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor utilize the Yellowfin Hybrid 26 to bring the Live Paddle Boards out to an Islamorada flat for a fun day of fishing for bonefish and some toothy critters.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor run west from Hawks Cay to fish the spring tarpon migration at the legendary Bahia Honda bridge.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor head down to Key West to join Captain Brandon Cyr for some skinny water bonefishing.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor fish the Lower Keys with Captain Brandon Cyr for baby tarpon in the mangroves.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: While releasing a defeated tarpon healthy after an epic battle is the ultimate victory, everything else is measured in heartbreak and degrees of failure. For Justin, putting Ethan on his first silver king requires patience and a tasty diversion by a local chef.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Meredith learns the value of the Trash Can Slam on a flounder trip withCapt. Justin that turns into a multi-species challenge.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: World record fly fisherman Nathaniel Linville shares his journey from troubled youth and addiction to redemption through fly fishing. After hitting rock bottom, he finds purpose in sobriety and relentless dedication, ultimately rising to the top as a world-record permit angler in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: A Man for All Seasons
programme.desc: From the Robert Bolt play.

programme.title: Only Angels Have Wings
programme.desc: Rough and tough Geoff Carter (Cary Grant) runs a tiny airline that cannot afford to miss any flights, despite the dangers along many of the routes. When Bonnie Lee (Jean Arthur), a performer who is falling for him, sees that Geoff is preparing to fly in violent weather conditions, she takes measures to make him stay. She's successful in her attempt, and two of his employees are forced to make the flight for him -- but Bonnie may have been correct about the potential peril of that flight.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: During World War II, a dilapidated vessel, the Caine, gets a new ensign, Willis Keith (Robert Francis), and a new captain, Commander Queeg (Humphrey Bogart). The crew sees Queeg's unconventional behavior as irrational, and communications officer Thomas Keefer (Fred MacMurray) spreads suspicion about his suitability as captain. When a dire situation during a storm forces the executive officer (Van Johnson) to relieve Queeg of his duties, he and Ensign Keith are tried for mutiny.

programme.title: Pal Joey
programme.desc: Charming musical featuring the love triangle between a lovable but mischievous man and the two women who could change his life, for love or money.

programme.title: Ten Cents a Dance
programme.desc: Barbara O'Neill (Barbara Stanwyck) is a poor dance hall girl who catches the eye of the wealthy Bradley Carlton (Ricardo Cortez). However, Barbara has feelings for her neighbor Eddie Miller (Monroe Owsley). After Eddie proposes to her, she says yes, and even secures a job for him from Bradley. Soon, though, Eddie has racked up deep gambling debts and even been unfaithful. Barbara continues to support him, but after he lashes out in jealousy she thinks maybe she should have chosen Bradley.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A stranded group of six Allied soldiers trek across the desert, making their way to an abandoned fort, but are soon faced with a German battalion.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: An English couple in Kenya raises an orphaned lion cub to adulthood. When a warden demands she be sent to a zoo, they train her to live in the wild.

programme.title: The Whole Town's Talking
programme.desc: Clerk Arthur Jones (Edward G. Robinson) lives a dull life until someone realizes that he looks like gangster "Killer" Mannion (also Robinson). After Jones is brought in by the police and his identity is verified, he is given a note to assuage any other suspicious policeman. Jones is hired by a newspaper to write about Mannion and starts dating Wilhelmina Clark (Jean Arthur). However, when Jones returns home one night, Mannion is waiting and demands the note so that he can roam freely.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: When a kerfuffle over fine wine exports upends their tiny nation's economy, the prime minister and grand duchess of Fenwick declare war on the U.S.

programme.title: What a Woman!
programme.desc: An author (Willard Parker) and a literary agent (Rosalind Russell) become involved after selling film rights to his racy book.

programme.title: To Sir, With Love
programme.desc: American Mark Thackeray (Sidney Poitier) recently received his degree in engineering, but cannot find work. To make ends meet, he takes a job as a teacher in a rough London East End school populated mostly with troublemakers who were rejected from other schools for their behavior. While the students at first see Thackeray as just another teacher open for ridicule and bullying, his calm demeanor and desire to see them succeed gradually earn him their respect.

programme.title: Dr. Strangelove Or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
programme.desc: Based on Peter George's book "Red Alert."

programme.title: The Guns of Navarone
programme.desc: Based on the book by Alistair MacLean.

programme.title: The Gun That Won the West
programme.desc: Superior Springfield rifles help scouts (Dennis Morgan, Richard Denning) and the cavalry get forts built in Wyoming.

programme.title: Pecos River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) catch mail robbers.

programme.title: Coroner Creek
programme.desc: A gunfighter (Randolph Scott) loses his beloved in a robbery and hunts the man (George Macready) to blame, who is living off the loot.

programme.title: The Man From Laramie
programme.desc: Will Lockhart (James Stewart) comes to the ranch town of Coronado looking for the man who is selling rifles to the Apaches, because his brother was killed with one. There he runs into Alec Waggoman (Donald Crisp), an aging rancher with a violent son named Dave (Alex Nicol). A conflict between Dave and Vic (Arthur Kennedy), Waggoman's top aid, helps Lockhart uncover the source of the rifles -- and also gets him involved in the power struggles at the Waggoman ranch.

programme.title: Good Day for a Hanging
programme.desc: When the local sheriff is killed after a bank robbery, ex-lawman Ben Cutler (Fred MacMurray) collars the apparent killer, Eddie Campbell (Robert Vaughn). Because of his background as a local youth who spent time living with the Cutlers, Eddie gets the benefit of the doubt from Ben's daughter and his wife-to-be, Ruth (Margaret Hayes). Ben is firm in his belief that Eddie is guilty, and as the matter is debated in a divisive court battle, it will soon become clear whether or not he's right.

programme.title: Ambush at Tomahawk Gap
programme.desc: Flaming arrows stop four ex-convicts searching a ghost town for their buried loot.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.desc: Phoebe Titus (Jean Arthur) is a tough-as-nails pioneer with dreams of starting a freight service in Tuscon, Ariz. Peter Muncie (William Holden), a vagabond passing through Arizona en route to California, takes a romantic interest in Phoebe and coaxes out her softer side. Just as their romance begins to blossom, Peter packs up and moves on. Though charming southerner Jefferson Carteret (Warren William) steps in to lend a hand, he may be plotting in secret to sabotage Phoebe's nascent business.

programme.title: Across the Sierras
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok (Bill Elliott) offends his betrothed (Luana Walters) when he shoots a bad guy on his trail.

programme.title: The Texas Rangers
programme.desc: The Civil War has ended, the Union Army has pulled out, and now the Texas Rangers are needed once again to protect their state from harm. The newly reformed Rangers decide to take a chance by hiring a notorious outlaw Johnny Carver (George Montgomery). They offer the desperado amnesty for his previous crimes if he'll put his famous trigger finger to work for Texas. Carver agrees, but his new job won't be easy, as his old rival, the Sundance Kid (Ian MacDonald), is out for vengeance.

programme.title: Fire on the Mountain
programme.desc: A stubborn rancher in his twilight years takes on the U.S. government when the Air Force tries to expropriate his New Mexico land for a missile range.

programme.title: Ride Beyond Vengeance
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Al Dewlen.

programme.title: Blazing the Western Trail
programme.desc: Noble cowboy the Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) gets snared in a vicious feud between two warring stagecoach operations. One of the two has been recently willed to spitfire Mary Halliday (Carole Mathews), whose father the Kid suspects was murdered by a business rival. With the help of his trusted friends Tex Harding (Tex Harding) and Cannonball (Dub Taylor), the Kid hopes to uncover the truth while hiding the investigation from the strident Miss Halliday.

programme.title: Smoky Canyon
programme.desc: The masked Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) settles a feud between cattlemen and sheepmen.

programme.title: The Great Sioux Massacre
programme.desc: The story of Gen. Custer (Philip Carey) and the Little Bighorn is seen through the eyes of two of his subordinates (Joseph Cotten, Darren McGavin).

programme.title: Edge of Eternity
programme.desc: Widowed Les Martin (Cornel Wilde) is an ex-detective haunted by a case he left behind in Denver. Now, Martin is the deputy sheriff of a small Arizona town with nothing to do but pull over beautiful local socialite Janice Kendon (Victoria Shaw) for occasional speeding -- until a mysterious murder at a nearby ghost town requires him to put his old skills to use once again. With the help of Sheriff Edwards (Edgar Buchanan) and Kendon, Martin must unravel a murderous plot involving stolen gold.

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A framed Texas rancher (Robert Knapp) escapes from prison for a showdown with a saloonkeeper (Walter Coy).

programme.title: Shut My Big Mouth
programme.desc: An Eastern milquetoast (Joe E. Brown) takes on outlaws in the Wild West.

programme.title: The Black Dakotas
programme.desc: A Confederate plot to turn the Sioux against the Union crumbles when a double agent makes off with a shipment of gold.

programme.title: Hands Across the Rockies
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok and his sidekick Cannonball meet a woman who is scheduled to marry the murderer they are trailing.

programme.title: California Frontier
programme.desc: An Army captain (Buck Jones) fights land-grabbers and woos a Mexican beauty (Carmen Bailey) in California.

programme.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
programme.desc: Texan and U.S. Cavalryman Lt. Frank Hewitt (Audie Murphy) deserts the army after Colorado Union soldiers carry out the deadly Sand Creek reservation massacre, fearing reprisal from the Cheyenne. Crossing into Texas, Franks finds himself labeled a traitor for fighting with the Yankees, and his warnings about possible Indian revenge go unheeded. When a town near a mission, populated mostly by women, is attacked, Frank is appointed their protector and must build an army comprised of townswomen.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: During the end of the Civil War, Major Dundee guards Confederate prisoners, Union deserters and ordinary hard-bitten criminals in a remote fort. When Apaches attack the fort and make off with three children, Dundee must set up a posse including Confederates, who face a choice between joining up or being shot. The feud between Dundee and Tyreen is also heated up by a sultry Mexican widow.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four soldiers of fortune are hired by a wealthy rancher to rescue his beautiful young wife who has been kidnapped by a villainous Mexican bandit. When they finally find her, after fighting their way across deserts and mountains, they discover she is not being held against her will. This causes friction within the band as to whether they should honor their agreement.

programme.title: Return to Warbow
programme.desc: Three escaped convicts return to collect the money that the brother of one of them has already spent.

programme.title: Room for One More
programme.desc: A couple raising three kids brings two orphaned children into their home.

programme.title: Boys Town
programme.desc: True story of Father Flanagan's fight to build a home for orphaned boys.

programme.title: San Antonio
programme.desc: A reformed rustler tracks down a band of cattle thieves.

programme.title: The Thin Man
programme.desc: Nick, Nora and their terrier somehow always seem to crack their case.

programme.title: Three Godfathers
programme.desc: Fugitives risk their lives to bring a baby out of the desert to safety.

programme.title: Doctor X
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a series of cannibalistic murders at a college.

programme.title: She
programme.desc: Explorers uncover a lost kingdom ruled by an immortal queen.

programme.title: The Human Comedy
programme.desc: A small-town telegraph boy deals with growing up during World War II.

programme.title: Bundle of Joy
programme.desc: A shop girl is mistaken for the mother of a foundling.

programme.title: Tortilla Flat
programme.desc: Inhabitants of a California village strive for the simple pleasures.

programme.title: The Hypnotic Eye
programme.desc: A city is stricken by a wave of horrific self-mutilations.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain
programme.desc: A Confederate troop makes a desperate attempt to build an army in the West.

programme.title: Horror of Dracula
programme.desc: After finding his missing friend undead in Draculas crypt, vampire hunter Van Helsing must save his pals frail fiance from the counts next bite.

programme.title: Juarez
programme.desc: The true story of Mexico's Abe Lincoln and his fight against the French.

programme.title: The Belle of New York
programme.desc: A turn-of-the-century playboy courts a Salvation Army girl.

programme.title: The Charge of the Light Brigade
programme.desc: Two brothers love the same woman at a perilous Indian outpost.

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: A pair of feuding co-workers at a music shop in turn-of-the-century Chicago have no idea they are falling in love as anonymous romantic pen pals.

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: A crack Nazi unit holds off the Allies during World War II.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: Judy Garland's 1944 musical dramatizes turn-of-the-century family life.

programme.title: Weekend at the Waldorf
programme.desc: The lives of guests and staff intertwine at a hotel over one weekend.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team race against time to find a killer who escaped from prison while helping to fight a fire in the Everglades; a local college student is found shot, but the blaze has destroyed the crime scene and evidence.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the possible murder of Jake Sullivan (Tony Hawk), a skateboarder and video-game tester.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When an IRS agent is killed trying to repossess a yacht, and another is shot to death soon afterward, the team searches for the perpetrators in a potential series of murders before tax day.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio gets life changing information about his deceased brother.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a bitter custody battle ends with a courthouse murder, the team must use the available evidence to find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When there is a murder at a high-school reunion, the team investigates and learns that popularity issues from the past played a role in the killer's motives.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a condemned ax-murderer on death row appeals for his life, the team must investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio finally learns the truth about what happened to his brother, and the repercussions will change his life forever.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio finds himself with a price on his head when he makes plans to shut down the illegal smuggling operation of one of Miami's fiercest gangs.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A rich couple's daughter dies when the family is trapped on a burning yacht in shark-infested waters.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a teenage tourist goes missing, the team investigates the dark side of Miami's nightclub scene.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a food scientist whose body was put through a meat grinder and mixed into canned stew; Angela puts together a post-wedding bachelorette party for Brennan.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a gymnast's remains are found in a park, Booth and Brennan discover she was living a double life; Cam confronts the woman who stole her identity.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates when the remains of a girl who died 18 years earlier are delivered to Brennan and Booth's house; Brennan dreams about Pelant.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a country music singer whose remains were found in a shallow grave; Brennan takes a look at Wendall's injuries after he breaks his arm during a hockey game.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the team discovers a renowned chess master in pig slop, Sweets goes under cover in the chess world; a science magazine honors Cam; Dr. Douglas Filmore fills in as lab intern.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a kidnap victim whose remains were found at a park; Hodgins makes a discovery about his family; Brennan and Boothe consider co-mingling their money.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth and CIA agent Danny Beck (Freddie Prinze Jr.) must track down a terrorist after a CIA informant is murdered; Brennan and Booth must consider the ramifications when Brennan wants to do more work in the field with Booth.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the remains of a repo man are found in a septic tank, the team learns he had a troubled past; a forensic anthropologist (Ignacio Serricchio) who has defected from Cuba needs an internship.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When an actor known for playing a popular character on a kids' TV show is murdered, unexpected suspects are discovered; Brennan and Booth plan a party for Christine's birthday; Clark asks for opinions on his novel.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a wealthy artifact collector walks into his own funeral, the team must determine the real identity of the deceased; Finn's new hot sauce venture is making big money.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of a former art student are found in a log in a forest; Wendell returns after beginning cancer treatments; Booth prepares for an FBI competency test.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a woman whose body was cryogenically frozen before being dumped in a swamp; Cam is nervous to meet Arastoo's parents; Booth is up for a promotion.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A routine trip to the hospital leads a wealthy businessman to lose his baby daughter after his SUV is hijacked.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A break in a six-month cyber crime investigation leads Michelle and Dev to pursue a reckless hacker.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Oz are taken hostage by two men posing as security guards when they are dispatched to a routine call in the financial district.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A celebrated restaurant chef is a star witness in the trial of a mob boss charged with shooting his business partner.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team must stop a gang of suspected murderers that is targeting a new victim nightly.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team must investigate targeted killings in Florida while each member is dealing with feelings about losing Prentiss.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A stalker in San Diego targets college students; Strauss scrutinizes the team after the loss of Prentiss.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team travels to a North Carolina town where one woman was found badly injured and another is missing, and discovers those may not be the only victims.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates when bodies are found buried beneath the ocean floor off Florida; Morgan is rattled when his aunt thinks her missing daughter is one of the victims.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates a suspected human trafficking ring; Hotchner suggests changes are coming; J.J. returns to the team.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A Senate committee questions the members of the BAU team; a familiar face may help keep the team united.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team investigates a series of murders in Oklahoma; Reid gives JJ and Prentiss the cold shoulder.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: After a mass murder at an Internet security company, evidence indicates that the person responsible is not a typical serial killer; Prentiss is required to complete recertification training.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A killer targets survivors of a high-school massacre, who have gathered for a reunion; Hotch fears that his son is being bullied.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A series of children are abducted from troubled women in St. Louis; Rossi's first wife shares shocking news.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates when multiple bodies are found in a national forest; Rossi faces an agonizing decision.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU investigates when bodies are exposed by tornadoes in Kansas; pressure at work affects J.J. at home.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers of Midsomer Barton are all set to celebrate Oak Apple Week, especially as the carnival queen event is set to return after an eight year absence. Yet the body of the mother of a deceased, one-time carnival queen, found in a stream, looks set to spoil things, as Barnaby and Jones find themselves digging up the past. From familiar faces, to drunken boasts and hidden obessions, it slowly becomes clear that the mother's daughter might be the key to solving the murder, when more deaths follow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Wealthy, eccentric and obese aristocrat Freddy Butler drops dead, shortly after gathering all three of his wives at Haddington Hall to make an announcement. Although George Bullard is adamant his death is from natural causes, the case is far from simple when Freddy's solicitor is deliberately killed in a house fire shortly afterwards and Freddy's will goes missing. Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating the extended Butler family, uncovering hidden secrets, illegitimate children and elusive treasure in the process.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Martin Barrett, a local council clerk living in Midsomer Worthy, is murdered during the night by shotgun, prompting Barnaby and Jones to find a motive for his murder. When they discover that Barrett was an expert blackmailer, his victims become prime suspects for his death - from a local pub landlord, a cleaner, a prominent member of the police board, to a former marine geologist. As they investigate, finding themselves drawn to the seaside, they slowly uncover deception, theft, attempted blackmail and hatred.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Broughton, a ninety-year-old battle of the sexes has often occurred, with men trying to oppose an event that the women have managed to successfully hold without interruption, until it culminates with casualties on both sides - Mildred Danvers, an elderly woman who had returned on the day of a funeral and poisoned in her hotel room, and Rev. Anthony Gant, shot during a major event being held in the village green, in view of many. It soon becomes clear someone may have wished to kill both to cover up a dark truth, and soon Barnaby has to figure out who amongst the village wanted both dead, complicated further when Gant's curate is murdered next.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers in Elverton-cum-Latterly are up in arms and divided, over the building of a supermarket. Things soon come to a head when independent environmental supervisor, Frank Hopkirk, is found stabbed to death at a Jubb's Timber Yard, the site of the new supermarket, by a pair of children. When Barnaby and Jones investigate to determine who wanted Hopkirk dead, they find out that he secretly came to the village under various aliases for sexual rendezvous with various women in fantasy role-playing scenarios, and that he had been making further investigations on the future development site and having doubts over claims it was contaminated. Either someone didn't like his investigations, or someone didn't like his sexual appetite, but either way, Barnaby finds himself investigating lies and more to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and DC Ben Jones (Jason Hughes) find themselves attempting to unravel the deaths of a choir tenor, and later a bird watcher, before more murders occur. The case is complicated by a rivalry between the Midsomer Worthy and Aston Wherry choirs, due to compete in an upcoming competition, and suspicions that an art scam is to be conducted, and soon Barnaby and Jones become concerned about a local woman, who they fear may become a victim herself. Particularly when it becomes clear the bird watcher had been photographing suspicious activity of late.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A few months ago, Annie Woodrow was arrested, accused of murdering her friend, Frances Trevelyan, on the motive of wanting Frances' husband. Her time in court has come, but DCI Barnaby is certain she still is holding things back in regards to the murder, and decides to monitor the trial. Yet a chance remark by Frances' youngest daughter, and a meeting with an old friend and psychiatrist, makes him begin to doubt the evidence for her conviction. Soon he and DC Jones, awaiting news of his promotion to DS, find themselves reinvestigating the case, and it soon becomes clear that they may have missed details that could implicate another in the murder.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a survivalist is found murdered in his bombproof shelter, Barnaby unravels a dark conspiracy to reveal how far people will go to escape the end of the world.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Gated estate Challis Court is a tight-knit community for retired police officers, but when a new arrival is found dead, the other residents regard the murder as an affront. Barnaby realizes that the killer is likely an ex-police officer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Pastry chef Chrissie Larkton's mill has been in her family for centuries. She restored it and turned it into a thriving online business, but the popularity has overshadowed Lower Blissingham, and many of the villagers are not happy about it.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The residents of Elverton-Cum-Latterly battle in the Dominoes Competition that dates back decades, but when the event occurs the same night as a drag queen fundraiser for a terminally ill teenager, it results in a deadly clash of cultures.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Plans by Barnaby to renew his wedding vows at the church of St Michael's in Badger's Drift, are quickly put on hold when the body of Richard Bayly, a local developer, is found decapitated in his own home. The detective is left mystified as to why anyone would kill a man who had only been given weeks to live, after being recently diagnosed with a brain tumour. As he and Troy attempt to find out, they soon encounter a hotbed of corruption and property feuding occurring within the village as the body count rises and the mystery deepens.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Carla Constanza - the face of Brazil's leading cigarette brand for Monarch Tobacco - is found strangled in the infamous Strangler's Wood, Barnaby and Troy not only find themselves investigating her murder, but three identical unsolved murders of innocent girls from eight years before.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Cully's latest boyfriend, Nico, decides to shadow Troy in preparation for a TV role he recently got, but gets more hands-on experience than he expected when investigations into a slashed painting at a museum in Aspern Tallow, a 17th century portrait of Royalist Jonathan Lowrie, are overshadowed by the murder of his descendant, Marcus Lowrie. It isn't long before Barnaby and Troy, with Nico's assistance, find themselves dealing with mysterious, ghostly events, escaped criminals, and a museum trustee who has more to them than meets the eye.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Hector Bridges, a local magistrate, is infuriated when one of his geese is stolen, just as two bands of travellers arrive in Martyr Warren. Although Barnaby and Troy are called in to deal with the theft and later dissuade him from forcefully evicting the travellers from the village, they soon have a murder on their hands, when a short while later Bridges is killed with his own shotgun. It quickly transpires that many in the village had hated the magistrate, who lied, bullied, and committed many an injustice, leaving the detectives determined to find who among them had pulled the trigger after Bridges pushed them past their breaking point.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The double murder of eccentric widow, Isobel Hewitt, and adulterous doctor, Duncan Goff, lead Barnaby and Troy into finding out more about their personal and private lives in the village of Malham Bridge. While Troy suspects an antique dealer that Isobel befriended is the culprit, Barnaby is not convinced, believing anyone the victims knew when they were alive could have been the murderer, from the doctor's wife to the local owner of a restaurant. Even Isobel's close family and members of a local fly fishing group are suspects as they investigate all possible angles.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Martin Wroath is found dead in his home in Midsomer Worthy, Barnaby is unconvinced that he committed suicide with his own shotgun in an unnecessarily complex fashion. When a second murder occurs on an assault course at a local cottage hospital, in which Wroath was a patient, the detective suspects a link between the two murders, and soon finds a wealth of hatred, jealously and lies, before discovering that rope in the village is mysteriously disappearing.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Joyce is taking part in an open-air art class, being held on the village green of Midsomer Florey, when she discovers the body of an elderly fellow student, Ruth Fairfax, concealed beneath some undergrowth shortly after a session. Just as Barnaby begins to learn that Ruth was not all she seemed to be, officers of the NIS pull him off the case. While Troy is allowed to assist them, Barnaby is left handling a local operation into a spate of thefts, yet he decides to continue his investigations in secret. In doing so, he soon turns up armed robbery, unaccounted stolen money, former criminals, and secret liaisons, before discovering that the NIS investigation is not being as thorough as it should be.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: At his family home in Upper Warden, arrogant actor Larry Smith is killed, when a summer house he walks in to as part of a promotion for the sequel to his hit film, The House of Satan, is suddenly destroyed in an explosion. His family quickly fling accusations for his murder directly at the residents of rival village, Lower Warden, leading Barnaby and Troy to determine if this is the case, especially when Larry's director, another member of the family, is electrocuted while using an exercise bike. It's not long before secrets, affairs and blackmail begin to surface from within the two villages.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: While Troy assists an attractive wildlife liaison officer with an investigation into the illegal sale of protected bird eggs, Barnaby travels to Midsomer Magna to investigate the sudden death of a man, who apparently drowned himself. While there was evidence he was desperately seeking to avoid bankruptcy, and had visited a local millionaire to get back his money from a scheme he had invested in, a post mortem reveals that he had been murdered. The two detectives soon find their investigations crossing over, when a man found to have an illegal collection of bird eggs, is also murdered, prompting concerns that the millionaire's scheme is being used to defraud many, and that someone is willing to kill to keep the scheme going.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: No one could suspect that a prestigious golf club would be the setting for murder, but when one of the major members is found dead, bludgeoned to death in a thicket next to the 13th hole, Barnaby and Jones try to determine what made him leave the fairway. It seems the club has a rift between the snobbish members, and local villagers, the latter only allowed onto the course for a few hours a week. Before long, another member turns up dead, and the detectives soon find the club has a hidden history, involving gambling, illegal money lending and assault, prompting the pair to determine if a club member, or one of its staff, is responsible for the deeds.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A newly discovered masterpiece by landscape artist Henry Hogson causes a stir when it is auctioned for 400,000 - just hours before its former owner is tortured and killed. When another Hogson is stolen, Barnaby decides to become an expert on the Midsomer painter, with the help of art teacher Matilda Simms (Susannah Harker). He soon realises the paintings are not what they seem - but the death toll is rising.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: The police dismiss Miss Marple's warning of another murder, until a body is found.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: While investigating the mysterious death of an elderly lady, she uncovers a secret.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: Hetty investigates the disappearance of a deaf, mute bird watcher.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: Hetty takes on a new case while on holiday with Robert. But who is she dealing with?

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: Robert is told that his uncle has committed suicide, but Hetty suspects otherwise.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: Jessica agrees to help an anxious mother whose schizophrenic adult son has disappeared.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: An old friend gives Hetty her most baffling case yet.

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: Journalist Maddy Magellan launches her own investigation into the death of a couple.

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: Jonathan and Maddy become drawn ever deeper into the puzzle of Hedley Shale's murder.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mary dabbles with Dave's dark arts in Torrence, Calif.; Kenny takes some excavation lessons; Brandi and Jarrod quit horsing around long enough to stumble across a wartime oddity.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The ladies from Vegas meet Dave, who promptly takes their locker away; Kenny uses Mary as a shield, and the two find their way to a decent unit of their own.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers dig deep for bargains in the desert country of Mojave, Calif.; Dave works hard despite his dislike of the territory; Ivy hunts for fun off-road finds.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy kidnaps Pops and takes him to Rosamond, where they deftly score a fine locker; Kenny sets out to brighten everyone's day and his clowning around has him seeing stars; Lisa proves she has a friend... for now.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi is fired up about expanding her brand in San Bernardino; Rene is positive that everyone is out to get him; Dusty tackles a locker dustier than him.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi is determined to actually win a locker for once in Santa Ana and has to show restraint to do it; Rene spots a stack of items in a locker that speaks to him; Kenny puts his needs out to the universe; Barry struggles to stay in the game.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to Palm Springs, Calif., in search of higher-end goods; Kenny tries to amp up the profit on an otherwise unimpressive unit; Rene sees quick potential where others don't; Brandi and Bozek try to keep their gains from squirming away.

programme.desc: Darrell has to deal with Kimber's eyes on a competitor; Ivy brings a full truck, hoping for a second haul; Dusty unpacks what could be the ultimate assistant; Rene's hunch serves him well, putting together one of his greatest profits.

programme.desc: It's a scorcher in Banning, so Kenny dresses "tropical" in hopes of channeling a Caribbean breeze; Rene is on the hunt for hot collectibles; Ivy can only bring "half" of Isaiah to help; Brandi's newfound Zen energy at the auction doesn't last.

programme.desc: Brandi wakes up on the wrong side of the bed but feels much better after picking up a locker in Placentia; Rene goes to the office to quickly flip his money; Kenny struggles just to get through his unit, which seems to have it in for him.

programme.desc: A confident Kenny has a three-step plan for success in Stanton, Calif.; Darrell helps Kimber find winning items for her new boutique; Rene brings Casey, who needs a distraction; Laura takes lead as auctioneer, while Dan holds the clipboard.

programme.desc: Kenny treats Perris, Calif., like a European vacation, picking up women along the way; Jarrod's lousy locker doesn't offer him any protection; Rene's tools end up being older than he expects.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers manage to make a charitable contribution in the neighborhood of North Long Beach; Darrell and Dave wager on who got the better sister locker; Brandi and Jarrod spend way too much, but see their treasure soar.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head out to Lake Arrowhead, Calif., where Ivy puts economies of scale to the test; Justin almost hits the bull's-eye on his locker; Darrell and Chad find fortunes on the farm.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: New buyers make their debut at the oldest facility in Los Angeles; Brandi and Jarrod try to piece their way to a win; Ivy attempts to hoard most of the units for himself.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave expands his inventory with a surprise medical device; a furniture locker proves enlightening to Rene; Ivy discovers unexpected green.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry Weiss and his cohort, Kenny, share behind-the scenes moments and commentary from favorite episodes of the series.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The blazing heat in Riverside inspires Lisa and Kenny to break out the parasols; Dusty wears his intuition on his sleeve; Ivy releases the hounds and makes out nicely as a result.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny happens upon a familiar vehicle and follows it all the way to Lancaster for an auction; Rene tries to find new luck, after losing in Vegas; Lisa tries to make up for last time; the Calvins look to a higher power for their profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy Calvin takes a seat along with Barry and Kenny to talk pigeons, turtles and the secrets of making a living as a storage buyer; the casts recount the craziest things they've ever heard Laura say and share their worst locker buying experiences.

programme.desc: The big guns come out in Riverside, but Rene isn't having any of it; Darrell presses his luck with a smaller locker and makes a neat profit; Dusty finds that once he gets going, it's hard to stop... so he just keeps reloading.
